about_the_game:
With the Legendary Palace ~ Medusa tileset for RPG Maker, send your RPG party into the heart of danger…but if you encounter the lair’s queen, don’t look at her!

The Legendary Palace ~ Medusa Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water
Concrete (light gray, dark gray, teal, purple)
floor tile (light gray, dark gray, teal and purple)
Large floor tile (light gray, dark gray, teal and purple) with edging
Shadow, cracks, rocks, and other grunge tiles
Spike traps
and more!

Walls:

Wall tiles to match floor tiles, plus some with black insets, useful for doors, etc.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
glow flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
jeweled wall decor
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
Assorted snake decor and jewels
lanterns
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest with jeweled, lit and unlit versions
Various animated glowing jewels
glowing block
glowing snake statue
glowing ladder tiles
glowing block

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
